GSD36mvir_sau:1214: si dvivināyakavrate ca madhyāhnavyāpinī caturthā prāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1220: yadi paredyureva madhyāhnavyāptiḥ tadaiva pare 'hani pañcamīviddhetyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1224: yadā tu pūrvaṃdine mātṛviddhā paredyureva ca madhyāhnavyāpinī bhavati tadā mātṛviddhātvaguṇayogena paradina eva vināyakavratamanuṣṭheyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1229: viṣāṇiṃ tasya naśyanti na taṃ hiṃsanti pannagāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:1232: yadā pūrvedyu reva madhyāhnavyāptiḥ tadaiva pūrvā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1234: pañcamyā nāgatithitvena tadyogasya prāśastyāt kecittu nāgadevatāvrate 'pi vināyakavratavat tṛtīyāyuktā grāhyetyāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1239: tatra hi caturthī tṛtīyāyuktā grāhyetyeyāvat pratīyate na punarnāgacaturthī tṛtīyāyukteti /
GSD36mvir_sau:1241: tena nāgadevatāvrate dinadvaye madhyāhnabyāptyādinā caturthīgrahaṇasandehe yugmavākyāt paraiva grāhyā,
GSD36mvir_sau:1242: yadā tu pūrvadina eva madhyāhnavabyāptistadā karmakālaśāstrasya prābalyāt pūrvā grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1247: gaurīvrate tu tṛtīyāyuktacaturthī grāhyā tṛtīyāyā gaurīdevatātvena tadyogasya prāśastyāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1253: nidrāṃ ratiṃ śivāṃ bhadrāṃ kīrtiṃ medhāṃ sarasvatīm /
GSD36mvir_sau:1254: prajñāṃ tuṣṭiṃ tathā kāntiṃ tatraivāhani pūjayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:1259: pūjāṃ kṛtvā labhet siddhiṃ saubhāgyaṃ ca naraḥ kramāt //
GSD36mvir_sau:1263: caturthī varadā nāma gaurī tatra supūjitā //
GSD36mvir_sau:1265: jayā ca yadi sampūrṇā caturthī hasate punaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1266: jayā saiva hi kartavyā nāgaviddhāṃ na kārayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:1267: iti vacanamapi gaurīvrate kaimutyanyāyena tṛtīyāyuktacaturthīṃ grāhyatayā pratipādayati /
GSD36mvir_sau:1269_0: yadā paradine caturthīhrāsena pañcamī viddhā bhavati pūrvadine punarjayā sampūrṇadinavyāpinī
GSD36mvir_sau:1269_1: bhavati tadā śuddhā tṛtīyāpi caturthīvrate grāhyā na tu doṣabhūyiṣṭhā pañcamīviddhā caturthīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:1270: na tvidaṃ vacanaṃ caturthīvrate śuddhatṛtīyāṃ grāhyatayā pratipādayati pañcamīviddhacaturthīniṣedhaparatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1273_0: yadā pūrvadine madhyāhne jayā sampūrṇā uttaradine punarhāsavaśāccaturthī madhyāhvādarvāgeva
GSD36mvir_sau:1273_1: samāpyate tadā dinadvaye karmakāle caturthyā abhāve sati kiṃ dinaṃ grāhyāmatyapekṣāyāmidaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:1274: jayāyā madhyānhavyāpitve 'pi jayāyuktā pūrvaiṃva caturthī grāhyā na tu nāgaviddhā parā caturthī /
GSD36mvir_sau:1276: vatsasya pūjā śivarātriretāḥ parā vinighnanti nṛpaṃ sarāṣṭram //

GSD36mvir_sau:1285: saṅkaṣṭacaturthī tu candrodayavyāpinī grāhyā tasyāstatkalpe candrodayakālatvavidhānāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1289: pañcamī upavāsādisakaladaivakarmasu pūrvayutā grāhyā yugabhūtānāmiti yuramavākyāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1291: pañcamī ca tathā kāryā caturthīsaṃyutā vibho/ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1294: pañcamī tu caturthyā tu kāryā ṣaṣṭhyā na saṃyutā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1298: iti vaśiṣṭhavākye parigaṇitavyatiriktāyāḥ paraśabdasaṃgṛhītāyāḥ pañcabhyā upavāse pūrvasaṃyuktatvābhidhānācca /
GSD36mvir_sau:1301: iti śivarahasyasaurapurāṇayostithiprāntasyopavāse aṅgatvābhidhānāttithidvaidhe paraviddhā tithirupavāse grāhyeti pratīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:1302: tathāpyasya sāmānyavidhitvāt prāgudāhṛtatattadviśeṣavacanaiḥ upavāse pañcamyāḥ pūrvayuktatvaṃ yuktameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:1303: etadevābhipretya prāyaḥ prānta iti prāyaḥśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1305: pañcamī tu prakartavyā ṣaṣṭhyā yuktā tu nārada/ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1315: caturthyā saṃyutā kāryā pañcamī parayā na tu /
GSD36mvir_sau:1316: deve karmaṇi pitrye ca śuklapakṣe tathāsite //
GSD36mvir_sau:1319: yathā pitrye aparāhṇādyanurodhena ṣaṣṭhīyuktapañcamīṃ parityajya caturthīsaṃyutā pañcamī upādīyate tathā daive 'pīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:1320: naca daive pūrvāhṇasya karmakālatvāt karmakālaśāstrasya ca prabalatvāt parayuktaiva pañcamī upādeyeti śaṅkanīyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1321: pūrvodāhṛtatattadviśeṣavacanānāṃ prabalataratvāt etādṛśa eva ca viṣaye“yāṃ tithiṃ samanuprāpya“itisākalyavacanamupapadyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:1324: ata evopavāsa eva pañcamī pūrvayutānyatra daive 'pyuttaraivetyaṣyabhidhānamayuktamava /
GSD36mvir_sau:1325: daive kammeṇīti daivamātre pṛrvayutatvapratīteḥ parayuktapañcamīvacanānāṃ skandopavāsavacanena viṣayadānācca /
GSD36mvir_sau:1329: caturthīsaṃyutā yā ca sā tṛtīyā phalapradā //
GSD36mvir_sau:1330: pañcamī ca prakartavyā ṣaṣṭhyā yuktā ca nārada/ //
GSD36mvir_sau:1332: tataśca yugmaśāstrayorvirodhe vyavasthāpakavacanāntarasyāpokṣitatvāt yuktā śuklakṛṣṇa śāstreṇa byavastheti /
GSD36mvir_sau:1334: prayuktā śuklakṛṣṇaśāstreṇa vyavasthā tāṃ nirākartumeva hārītavacane “śuklapakṣe tathāsita'; ityuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1335: tena viruddhamāpastambādiyugmaśāstraṃ skandopavāsaviṣayaṃ yuktamiti tasmāt pūrvoktaiva vyavasthā jyāyasī /
GSD36mvir_sau:1338: sā ca skandavratātirikte sarvatra daivakārye saptamīyuktā grāhya ṣaṇmunyoritiyugmavākyāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1344: daive karmaṇi tāmantyāṃ pitrye pūrveṇa saṃyutām //
GSD36mvir_sau:1345: iti sumantunā pañcamīviddhāniṣedhapuraḥsaraṃ daive karmaṇi antyaḥśabdoditāyāḥ saptamīviddhāyā vidhānācca /
GSD36mvir_sau:1346: nāgaviddhā tu yā ṣaṣṭhī śivaviddhātu saptamī /
GSD36mvir_sau:1349: nāgaviddhā tu yā ṣaṣṭhī rudraviddho divākaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1350: kāmaviddho bhaved viṣṇurna grāhyāste tu vāsarāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:1362: iti skandapurāṇavacanāt ṣaṇmuhūrtātmako na tu sāmānyatastrimuhūrtāmakaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1369: idaṃ vacanaṃ yā dvādaśanāḍīmitapañcamyā viddhā ṣaṣṭhī sāmānyataḥ sarvadaivakāryeṣu niṣiddhā tasyā eva skandavrate pratiprasavārtham /
GSD36mvir_sau:1370: tathāca skandavrate 'pi dvādaśanāḍīviddhāyā niṣiddhatvāt tato nyūnapañcamīyutaiva grāhyeti jñātavyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1372_0: kiñca“nāgo dvādaśanāḍībhiḥ“iti vākyaṃ na sarvatra dvādaśanāḍīmitapañcamyā uttaratithidūṣakatvābhidhānaparaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:1372_1: tadabhidhāne gauravāt kintu yatra dūṣakatvaṃ prāptaṃ tatraiva dūṣakatvānuvādena dvādaśanāḍīmitatvavidhānaparam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1373: skandavrate tu pūrvayutāyā eva grāhyatvābhidhānānna dūṣakatvamiti dvādaśanāḍīmitapañcamīviddhāyāmapi tatkāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1375: ekādaśī tṛtīyā ca ṣaṣṭhī caiva trayodaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:1378: pūrvedyuḥ ṣaṇmuhūrtapañcamīviddhāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhyāstrimuhūrtādhikakṣayāsambhavena uttaradine 'pi trimuhūrtāyā avaśyambhāvitvāt “yadi na syāt';
GSD36mvir_sau:1380: kintu ekabhaktādikāle madhyānhādau pare 'hani yadi na syāttadā yā skandavratātirikte savartra niṣiddhā pūrvaviddhā sāpi kartavyeti pratiprasavārtham /
GSD36mvir_sau:1394: sā ca sarvatra daive pūrvaviddhaiva grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1401: pañcamī saptamī caiva daśamī ca trayodaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:1407: iti upavāsa eva viddhāyā niṣedhāttatraiva pūrvaviddhāyā grāhyatvamastu /
GSD36mvir_sau:1413: ṣaṣṭhyā yuktā saptamī ca kartavyā tāta/ sarvadā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1414: ṣaṣṭhī ca saptamī yatra tatra sannihito raviḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:1421: yadā tu pūrvedyuḥ astamayottaraṃ pravṛttā paredyuśca tithikṣayavaśena trimuhūrtayā aṣṭamyā viddhatvāt śuddhā pūrvaviddhā vā na labhyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:1422: tadā“guṇe tvanyāyyakalpanā“itinyāyāt guṇānurodhena pradhānatyāgāyogāt niṣedhamatikramyāpi va canābhāve 'pi guṇakālatvena aṣṭamīviddhāyā evopādānaṃ nyāyyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1428: vaiśākhaśuklasaptamyāṃ gaṅgāpūjā tatra madhyānhavyāpinī grāhyā śiṣṭācārāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1431: sā ca vratamātre śuklā parā kṛṣṇā pūrvā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1435: pūrvaviddhā tu kartavyā paraviddhā na kutracit //
GSD36mvir_sau:1463: dūrvāṣṭamī tu sā jñeyā nottarā sā vidhīyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:1466: muhūrte rauhiṇe 'ṣṭamyāṃ pūrvā vā yadi vā parā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1467: dūrvāṣṭamī tu sā kāryā jyeṣṭhāṃ mūlaṃ ca varjayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:1468: iti parābhidhānaṃ tat pūrvadine jyeṣṭhādiyoge veditavyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1474: iyaṃ ca kanyārke agastyodaye ca na kāryā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1476: siṃhārka eva kartavyā na kanyārke kadācana //
GSD36mvir_sau:1480: vaidhavyaṃ pūrvaśokaṃ ca daśavarṣāṇi pañca ca //
GSD36mvir_sau:1484: kanyārke yāṣṭamī śuklā jyeṣṭharkṣe mahatī smṛtā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1489: navamyā saha kāryā syādaṣṭamī nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1496: tasmin haviṣyaṃ pūjā ca nyūnā cet pūrvavāsare //
GSD36mvir_sau:1506: ititallakṣaṇārthe skāndavacane tatreti saptamyā nirdiṣṭāyā aṣṭamyāstatra “jayāṃ juhuyāt'; (a 0 3 pā 04 adhi 0 13)
GSD36mvir_sau:1511: pūrvā vā paraviddhā vā grāhyā candrodaye sadā /

GSD36mvir_sau:1524: iti navamīyuktāyā niṣedhakathanaṃ tadardharātrādūrdhvaṃ trimuhūrtatvābhāve trimuhūrtetyupādānāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1528: āśvinaśuklāṣṭamī tu durgāṣṭamī sā ca sāmānyanirṇayādeva navamīviddhā kāryā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1530: sāmānyanirṇayādevāsyā uttaraviddhatvaṃ tathāpi iyaṃ leśato 'pi saptamīviddhā na kartavyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1537: putrān hanti paśūn hanti hanti rāṣṭraṃ sarājakam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1557: ahaṃ bhadrā ca bhadrāhaṃ nāvayorantaraṃ kvacit /

GSD36mvir_sau:1576: atra ca putravatā upavāso na kārya ityuktam--
GSD36mvir_sau:1579: yathā tathā vā pūtātmā vratī devīṃ prapūjayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:1582: kanyāṃ gate savitari śuklapakṣe 'ṣṭamī tu yā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1590: leśamātreṇa saptamyā api syād dūṣitā yadi /
GSD36mvir_sau:1606: tadā tu sā mahāpuṇyā jayantī aṣṭamī śubhā //
GSD36mvir_sau:1618: tathāpyekamūlakalpanālāghavāt paurṇamāsyantaṃ māsamādāya bhādre amāvāsyāntamādāya śrāvaṇe grāhyā ityanusandheyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1619: evaṃ ca“tithikṛtye ca kṛṣṇādim“iti vacanaṃ nātra śrāvaṇasya paurṇamāstantatvavidhāyakaṃ kintu etadatiriktaviṣayakalpanā lāghavāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1620_0: bhādrastu yadyapi bhādraśrutyāmāvāsyānta eva prāpnoti mūlaśrutikalpanāgauravasya
GSD36mvir_sau:1621: sā ca dvividhā śuddhā saptamīviddhā ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:1622: tatra dvividhā api sūryodayādūrdhvagāminī na veti dvividhā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1627: sūryodayordhvagāminyāṃ tu śuddhāyāṃ viddhāyāṃ vā rohiṇīyogasyānyataratra sattve saiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:1634: tenottaradina eva rohiṇīyoge pūrvaniśīthavyāpinī śuddhāpi tyājyeti hemādrimādhavādayaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1637: atrārddharātrasya vakṣyamāṇarītyā karmakālatvāt karmakālaśāstrasya ca sarvāpekṣayā balavattvāt parīdane ca tadabhāvāt pūrvaiveti /
GSD36mvir_sau:1642: yaiḥ kṛtā śrāvaṇe māsi hyaṣṭamī rohiṇīyutā //
GSD36mvir_sau:1645: iti pādmāt pūrvejhurarddharātragatāṃ rohiṇīyutāmaṣyaṣṭamīṃ parityajya budhavārādiyutā parā kartavyā āpadyeta /
GSD36mvir_sau:1647: kulakoṭayāstu muktidā kiṃ punarbudhavāreṇetyādinā“yadi kāmayeta varṣukaḥ parjanyaḥ syāt“itivat (a0 3 pā0 8 adhi0 6)
GSD36mvir_sau:1656: udaye cāṣṭamī kiñcit navamī sakalā yadi /
GSD36mvir_sau:1659: divā vā yadi vā rātrau nāsti cedrohiṇī kalā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1661: itivacanāt paradine rohiṇīyogābhāva eva rātriyuktāṣṭamī grāhye ti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1662: tasya taddine svalpasyāpi rohiṇīyogasyābhāve 'pi nyāyaprāptaśuddhā ṣṭamīvratakartavyatānuvādakatvāt iti śiṣṭamatamanavadyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1663: dinadvaye rohiṇīyoge 'yoge vā śuddhādhikā pūrvaiva tadatikrame kāraṇābhāvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1665: viddhādhikāyāṃ tvanyatarasminneva dine niśīthe rohiṇīyoge saiva rohiṇīyogaprāśastyāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1674: ata eva viddhādhikāyāṃ dvinadvaye 'pi niśītha matikramya rohiṇīyoge 'ṣṭamyāśca dinadvaye niśīthe sattvāsattavayoḥ paraiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:1676: sarvathā rohiṇīyogarahitāyāmaṣṭamyāṃ niśīthe dinadvayasattvānyatarasattveṣvayameva nyāyo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1680: iti gauḍadhṛtaviṣṇurahasyavacanāt rohiṇyalābhe sarvathā pūrvaiva grāhyā syāditivācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1684: arddharātre tu rohiṇyāṃ yadā kṛṣṇāṣṭamī bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:1690: na caivaṃ pūjopavāsayoḥ phalabhedāt samānaphalakatve 'pi vā nirapekṣavidhānāt citrodbhidādivadekaikasyāpyanuṣṭhānaprasaṅga iti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1691: sopavāso hareḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tatra na sīdati /
GSD36mvir_sau:1695: varṣe varṣe tu kartavyā tuṣṭayarthaṃ cakrapāṇinaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:1698: na cātra tuṣṭayarthamitiphalaśravaṇāt phalanimittoddeśyadvayanimittavākyabhedaḥ syāditi vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1706: tatra kevalāṣṭyamyupavāse pāraṇadine cāṣṭamyanuvṛttau tadante kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1712: rohiṇīsahitāṣṭamyupavāse tu pāraṇadine ubhayānuvṛttāvubhayānte tat kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1716: idaṃ cobhayānte pāraṇaṃ mahāniśāto 'rvāgubha yānte bhojanaparyāptakālalābhe /
GSD36mvir_sau:1717: na rātrau pāraṇaṃ kuryādṛte vai rohiṇīvratāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1722: iti smṛteḥ rohiṇīvrataṃ cātra taduktāṣṭamīvratameva prakaraṇāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1729: yadā tu tādṛśe kāle ubhayānto na labhyate tadānyatarānte 'pi tat kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1733: yadā tu mahāniśāyāḥ pūrvaṃ pāraṇāparyāptaḥ kālo na labhyate tadā tatrāpi kuryāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1740: gauḍāstu arddharātrena tat kuryāt iti paṭhitvā yadyardharātre ubhayoranyatarasya vāntastadā nārddharātre pāraṇaṃ kintu divaiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:1743: tithyante votsavānte vā vratī kurvīṃta pāraṇam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1745: hemādristu ubhayānte pāraṇaṃ śaktaviṣayamaśaktasya tu anyatarānte tato 'pyaśaktasyotsavānta ityāha /
GSD36mvir_sau:1755: navamyā saha kāryā syādaṣṭamī navamī tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1762: navamyekādaśī caiva diśā viddhā yadā bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:1763: tadā varjyā viśeṣeṇa gaṅgāmbhaḥ surayā yathā //
GSD36mvir_sau:1775: nanu pūrvoṃktaniṣedhasya kṛṣṇaśuklapakṣobhayasādhāraṇatvena sāmānyarūpasya kṛṣṇapakṣe saṅkoco 'stviti cet, maivam /

GSD36mvir_sau:2388: hemādristu asmin dvitīye pakṣe śuddhaikādaśyupavāsavidhāyakānāṃ vacanānāṃ gṛhasthaviṣayakatvaṃ śuddhadvādaśyupavāsavidhāyakānāṃ tu yativiṣayatvam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2391: na garbhe viśate janturityāha bhagavān hariḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2393: atra ca na garbhe viśate janturityato yatipratīterityāha /
GSD36mvir_sau:2396: dvādaśī ca trayodaśyāmasti tatra kathaṃ bhavet //
GSD36mvir_sau:2415: vidhavāyāśca tatreva parato dvādaśī na cet /
GSD36mvir_sau:2423: na ca prāgudāhṛtavacanānusārāt sakāmaniṣkāmapadaṃ gṛhiyatiparamastviti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2425: prātarbhavatu vā mā vā dvādaśī ca dvijottama/ //
GSD36mvir_sau:2427: viṣṇuprītikāmanāyāṃ tu etādṛśe viṣaye dinadvaye 'pyupavāsaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2429: trayodasī uṣaḥ kāle upoṣyā tatra kābhavet //
GSD36mvir_sau:2432: kecittu dve upoṣye ityanena naikasyopavāsasya āvṛtyā vidhānaṃ kintu kaiścitpūrvā kaiściduttareti tithidvayopoṣyatvapratipādanaparaṃ pūrvaikavākyatvādityāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2437: ekādaśī na labhyate dvādaśī sakalā bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:2440: atra ca viddhāyā anādhikyaṃ sāmyena kṣayeṇa ca bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:2444: tasya putrā vinaśyanti maghāyāṃ piṇḍado yathā //
GSD36mvir_sau:2452: upoṣyā dvādaśī śuddhā trayodaśryāṃ ca pāraṇam //
GSD36mvir_sau:2454: atraca dinakṣaye viddhāniṣedhasya putravadviṣayatvāt dvādaśyupavāso 'pi tadviṣaya eveti dhyeyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2455: sāmyena anādhikye tu putra vatāmapi pūrvatraiva“dinakṣaya“ityādinā kṣaya evaiteṣāṃ viddhopavāsaparyudāsāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:2457: ekādaśī kalāpyekā parato na ca varddhate /
GSD36mvir_sau:2462: daśamīmiśritā pūrvā pūrṇā ca dvādaśī parā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2469: iti sumantuvacanaṃ tat kṣayaśabdena vṛddhyabhāvalakṣaṇayā sāmyaparameva vyākhyeyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2471: na caitadvacanānurodhāt pādmasyaiva lakṣaṇayā sāmyaparatvamastviti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2473: madanaratnastu sāmye kṣaye ca yatīnāṃ paraiva pūrvodāhṛtasumantuviṣṇurahasyavacanābhyām /
GSD36mvir_sau:2486: ekādaśī yadā luptā parato dvādaśī bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:2491: ityuttarārddhaṃ paṭhitvā śuklapakṣe daśamīviddhā tyājyā kṛṣṇapakṣe tu daśamīviddhā grāhyetyāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2493: kimatra viddhāniṣedhaḥ śuklapakṣa eveti vidhīyate kiṃ vā viddhāvidhiḥ kṛṣṇapakṣa eveti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2499: prātarbhavatu vā mā vā yato nityamupoṣaṇam //
GSD36mvir_sau:2500: iti vacanaṃ prātastrayodaśīdine dvādaśī bhadhatu vā mā veti vyākhyāya trayodaśryāṃ dvādaśīsattve 'pi viddhāyāmevopavāsa ityuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2505: daśamīvedhe prātaḥ saṅkalpakāle ekādaśī bhavatu vā mā vā sarvathopavāsaḥ kartavya eveti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2506: vastutastu hemādṣādau“dvādaśīmiśritā naraiḥ“ityeva vākyamudāhṛtamiti na kaściddoṣaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2507: yā tu viddhādhikādhikadvādaśikā sā sarveṣāṃ paraiva viddhāniṣedhavākyānāṃ niraṅkuśaṃ tatraiva pravṛtteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2508: yā tu viddhādhikānadhikadvādaśikā sā sarvairapi paraivopoṣyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2510: dvādaśī ca trayodaśyāṃ vidyate yadi vā navā //
GSD36mvir_sau:2513: tatra kratuśataṃ puṇyaṃ trayodaśyāṃ ca pāraṇam //
GSD36mvir_sau:2515: asmiṃśca kṣayeṇa dvādaśyā anādhikye kaurmokteḥ putravadgṛhasthairnopavāsaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2521: ekādaśī yadā vṛddhā dbādaśī ca kṣayaṃ gatā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2522: kṣīṇā sā dvādaśī jñeyā naktaṃ tatra vidhīyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:2532: atra ca yeṣu pakṣeṣu viddhopavāsaprasaktistatra rātrau pūjāvratasaṅkalpāvanuṣṭheyau /
GSD36mvir_sau:2536_0: yeṣu tu śuddhopavāsaprasaktistatra yadi pūrvadine madhyarātrāt pūrvaṃ daśamī tadā“prātaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:2537: yadā tu madhyarātrottaraṃ daśamyā vedhastadā madhyāhnottaraṃ pūjāvratasaṅkalpā vanuṣṭheyau /
GSD36mvir_sau:2542: ardharātrāt parā yatra ekādaśyāṃ tu labhyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:2547: anye tu kapālavedhasyāpi aruṇodayavedhavannityavadeva dūṣakatvam asmād vacanāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:2559: yadā bhavati alpā tu dvādaśī pāraṇādine /
GSD36mvir_sau:2562: na coṣaḥkālasyālpatvāt kathaṃ tāvat karmānuṣṭheyamiti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2568: apakarṣaśca smārttasyaiva na śrautasya tato balīyastvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:2571: atra ca prātarmādhyāhnikagrahaṇānna naimittikasaṅkrāntivyatīpātādiyuktasya tattatkāle vihitasya snānādikarmaṇaḥ sāṃvatsarikādervāpakarṣaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2572: evaṃ bhūyasyāmapi dvādaśryāṃ mādhyāhnikāpakarṣaḥ prātaḥ kārya eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:2575: yadā tu prātaḥkālo dvādaśīprathamapādāntargato bhavati tadā tadante pāraṇā kāryā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2582: sā tu ekādaśīyuktā grāhyā“rudreṇa dvādaśī yuktā“iti yugmavacanāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:2583: dvādaśī ca prakartavyā ekādaśyā yutā prabho/ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2591: yadā caikādaśyupavāsadvādaśyupavāsayorekasmin dine prasaktistadopavāsadvayamapi tantreṇa kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2592: yadā tu sampūrṇayostithyorbhedenopavāsadvayaprasaktistadā ekādaśyupavāsasaṃyuktāṃ pāraṇāṃ jalena kṛtvā dvādaśīvratamārabheteti mādhavaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2593: ayameva ca nyāyaḥ sarvatra upavāsadvayaprasaktau dhyeyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2598: pāraṇāhe na labhyeta dvādaśī ghaṭikāpi cet /
GSD36mvir_sau:2602: śrāvaṇasya site pakṣe karkasthe ca divākare /
GSD36mvir_sau:2607: yā rāma/ śravaṇopetā dvādasī mahatī tu sā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2612: dvikalo yadi labhyeta sa jñeyo hyāṣṭayāmikaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:2615: tatra yā tāvadekasminneva dine śravaṇayogavatī śuddhā śuddhādhikā vā viddhā viddhādhikā vā tasyāṃ sandeha eva nāsti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2616: yadā viddhādhikāyāṃ dinadvaye 'pi śravaṇayogastadā ekādaśīyutā grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2627: yadā tu dvādaśyāṃ śravaṇayoga eva nāsti tadā ekādaśyāmeva tadvatyāṃ śravaṇadvādaśīvrataṃ kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2628: yadā na prāpyate ṛkṣaṃ dvādaśyāṃ śravaṇaḥ kvacit /
GSD36mvir_sau:2634: vijayā sā tithiḥ proktā bhaktānāṃ vijayapradā //
GSD36mvir_sau:2636: viddhādhikye 'pi cottaradine śravaṇayogābhāve tādṛśī daśamīviddhāpi grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2641: yadā caikādaśīśravaṇadvādaśyupavāsau dinabhedena prāpnutastadā śaktena dvayamapi kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2646: dvādaśyāṃ śuklapakṣe tu nakṣatraṃ śravaṇaṃ yadi /
GSD36mvir_sau:2653: atra ca yadā kadācicchravaṇayoge 'pi prātareva saṅkalpa iti hemādriḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2656: mahatī nāma sā jñeyā upavāse mahāphalā //
GSD36mvir_sau:2662: śravaṇadvādaśīvratanimittopavāsapāraṇaṃ tu pāraṇādine ubhayānuvṛttau tūbhayānte kartavyamiti mukhyaḥ kalpaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2665: pāraṇaṃ tu na kartavyaṃ yāvannaikasya saṅkṣayaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:2667: madanaratnastu atra yadyapi tithinakṣatrayoranyatarānte pāraṇaṃ pratīyate tathāpi tithyanta eva kāryam na tu tithimadhye 'pi nakṣatramātrānte /
GSD36mvir_sau:2677: jayā ca vijayā caiva jayantī pāpanāśinī //
GSD36mvir_sau:2681: ekādaśī tu sampūrṇā varddhate punareva sā //
GSD36mvir_sau:2687: ante trayodaśī bhadrā trispṛśā sā prakīrttitā //
GSD36mvir_sau:2698: atra ca tithiprayuktāsu na ko 'pi vicāraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2701: itarāsu nakṣatraprayuktāsu tu na śravaṇadbādaśīvadalpayoge 'pi pūjyatvaṃ kintu sūryodayādārabhya punastatparyantamastamayaparyantaṃ vā sattva eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:2706: etāścāṣṭau mahādvādaśyaḥ kāmyāḥ mahāpuṇyā ityādinā phalaśravaṇāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:2708: na kariṣyanti ye loke dvādaśyo 'ṣṭau mamājñayā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2728: dvitīyā pañcamī vedhāt daśamī ca trayodaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:2729: caturdaśī copavāse hanyuḥ pūrvottare tithī // iti,
GSD36mvir_sau:2734: yadā tu paradine trayodaśī nāsti tadā pūrvaviddhā kāryā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2737: ekādaśī tṛtīyā ca ṣaṣṭhī caiva trayodaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:2738: pūrvaviddhāpi kartavyā yadi na syāt pare 'hani //
GSD36mvir_sau:2747: dvitīyā pañcamī vedhāt daśamī ca trayodaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:2751: atra ca pūrvaviddhāyā grāhyatvaṃ na sāyāhnamātravyāpitve kintu aparāṅṇavyāpitve /
GSD36mvir_sau:2764: tatastu lohite bhānau snātvā saniyamo vratī /
GSD36mvir_sau:2767: dinadvaye pradoṣavyāpitve tadekadeśasparśe vā uttarā grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2780: yadyāpi cātra sāmānyanirṇayādaparāhṇavyāpinī pūrvaviddhā prāpyate tathāpi--
GSD36mvir_sau:2783: iti saṃvartavacanāt sāyānhavyāpinyā api pūrvaviddhāyā grahaṇam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2784: anyathā hi sāmānyanirṇayādeva prāpteretasya vacanasya nirarthakatvāpatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2793: śuklā caturdaśī grāhyā paraviddhā sadā vrate /
GSD36mvir_sau:2797: etāḥ parayutāḥ kāryāḥ parāḥ pūrveṇa saṃyutāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:2800: sadā kāryā trayodaśyā na tu yuktā caturdaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:2808: ekādaśī daśamyā tu saptamyā cāṣṭamī tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2809: pañcamyā ca yadā ṣaṣṭhī trayodaśyā caturdaśī //
GSD36mvir_sau:2810: āsu kriyā na kurvīta pūrvaviddhāsu mānavaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2819: madhoḥ śrāvaṇamāsasya śuklā yā tu caturdaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:2823: niśi bhramanti bhūtāni śaktayaḥ śūlabhṛt/ yataḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2836: dadarśa śīlā sā strīṇāṃ samūhaṃ raktavāsasām //
GSD36mvir_sau:2843: “daive hyaudayikī grāhyā“iti pratyakṣavacanavirodhāt audayikī grāhyā na madhyāhnagateti saṅkṣepaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2848: pūrvaviddhā tu kartavyā paraviddhā na karhicit //
GSD36mvir_sau:2858: amāvāsyā tṛtīyā ca tā upoṣyāḥ parānvitāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:2861: śivavrate tu pakṣadvayagate caturdaśyau trayodaśīyute aparāhṇavyāpinyau grāhye /
GSD36mvir_sau:2864: caturdaśī tu kartavyā trayodaśyā yutā vibho/ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2875: pūrvaviddhā tu kartavyā paraviddhā na karhicit //
GSD36mvir_sau:2879: taditaravrateṣu“ubhe pakṣe caturdaśī“iti prāgudāhṛtapadmapurāṇāt tādṛśavṛddhavaśiṣṭhavacanācca uttaraviddhā grāhyeti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2886: varṣe barṣe tu kartavyaṃ mama santuṣṭikāraṇam //
GSD36mvir_sau:2887: dinadvaye tadvyāptau aṃśataḥ samavyāptau vā paraiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:2890: paradine gauṇavyāpteḥ sattvāt pūrvadine ca tadabhāvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:2896: tat saṅkalparūpavratopakramaviṣayaṃ na tu pradhānasya madhyāhnakālatvajñāpakam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2912: vārāho girijāsute nabhasi yadbhūte site mādhave //
GSD36mvir_sau:2914: siṃho bhādrapade site haritithau śrīvāmano mādhave
GSD36mvir_sau:2924: jyeṣṭhaśuklacaturdaśyāṃ sarvasmin dine pañcāgnisādhanaṃ kṛtvā pradoṣe hemadhenurdeyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2933: atra dinodaya iti śravaṇāt prātaḥkālavyāptitvamiti gauḍāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2954: varṣe ca hemalambākhye māse śrīmati kārttike /
GSD36mvir_sau:2964: rājā ca tatra sampūjyo yamaḥ pralayabhāskaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2972: atra ca rātriśabdastithilakṣakaḥ sivaśabdaśca śivavratalakṣakaḥ prakaraṇāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:3008: prabhāte vimale jāte dṛṣṭvā tatraiva śaṅkaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:3022: jāgaraṃ kurute tatra sa rudrasamatāṃ vrajet //
GSD36mvir_sau:3024: tadetat śivarātrivrataṃ janmāṣṭamīvat saṃyogamapṛthaktvanyāyena nityaṃ kāmyaṃ ca tatra nityatvaṃ tāvat skandapūrāṇe--
GSD36mvir_sau:3033: arṇavo yadi vā śuṣyet kṣīyeta himavānapi /
GSD36mvir_sau:3040: śivaṃ ca pūjayitvā yo jāgartti ca caturdaśīm /
GSD36mvir_sau:3048: sarvān bhuktvā tato bhogān mṛto bhūpo 'bhijāyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:3052: sarvān kāmānavāpnoti pretya ceha ca mānavaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3059: mādhamāse tu yā kṛṣṇā phālgunādau caturdaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:3065: anyathā yo dadātīha sa dātā narakaṃ vrajet //
GSD36mvir_sau:3072: ata evātra vedho 'pi na divāvedha eva kintu janmāṣṭamīvadrātrivedho 'pi bhavatyeva /
GSD36mvir_sau:3077: bhūtāni śaktayo yoginyo 'pi śūlabhṛcchaṅkaraśca yato rātrau bhramanti ataḥ satyāṃ tasyāṃ pūjanaṃ bhavediti hemādriḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3079: yadā dinadvaye niśīthavyāpinī tadā pūrvaiva grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3088: śrāvaṇī durganavamī tathā dūrvāṣṭamī tu yā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3092: anaṅgena samāyuktā kartavyā sā sadā tithiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3100: bhūtaviddhā ca yā tatra śivarātrivrataṃ caret //
GSD36mvir_sau:3106: atra rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ yasmāditi hetuvaśāt pradoṣaśabdo rātriparo 'vagantavyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3116: yadā tu niśīthādūrdhvagā trayodaśī pera'hani ca niśīthāvyāpinyapi caturdaśī bhavati tadā paraiva grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3119: māghāsite bhūtadinaṃ hi rājannupaiti yogaṃ yadi pañcadaśyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3120: jayāprayuktāṃ na tu jātu kuryācchivasya rātriṃ priyakṛcchivasya //
GSD36mvir_sau:3122: jayāprayuktāṃ jayayā trayodaśyā prakarṣeṇa niśīthādūrdhvaṃ yuktāṃ na kuryāt nopavaset kintu sakaladinabhūyorātrilābhāt parāmevetyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3123: tathāca yat śivarātrivrate bhūtāṃ kāmaviddhāṃ vivarjayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:3126: niśādvayacaturddraśyāṃ pūrvā tyājyā parā śubhā / iti,
GSD36mvir_sau:3130: pūrvasyā eva niśīthavyāptau uttarāyā eva vā niśīthavyāptau tatkālavyāpinī grāhyetyuktam--
GSD36mvir_sau:3139: vyāptā sā dṛśyate yasyāṃ tasyāṃ kuryāt vrataṃ naraḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:3147: iti kāmyaṃ pratimāsaṃ śivarātrivrataṃ tatrāpi pūjopavāsajāgaraṇavidhānāt tasya ca sakalarātrisādhyatvāt bahurātrivyāpinyāmanuṣṭhānam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3152: asyāśca mahāśiva rātreḥ ravibhaumavārānyatarayoge praśastataratvaṃ śivayogayoge praśastatamatvaṃ ca skandapurāṇe--
GSD36mvir_sau:3167: itivacanāt paradine yadi divā tithyantastadā tatraiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:3173: sikthe sikthe phalaṃ tasya vastuṃ śakto na pārvati/ //
GSD36mvir_sau:3174: brahmāṇḍodaramadhye tu yāni tīrthāni santi vai /
GSD36mvir_sau:3188: bhūtaviddhā na kartavyā darśaḥ pūrṇā kadācana /
GSD36mvir_sau:3192: evaṃ yat“caturdaśyā ca pūrṇimā“itiyugmavākyaṃ tat sāvitrīvrataviṣayam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3195: atra ca na pūrvaviddhāniṣedhastasyāstrimuhūrtasattve kiṃ tvaṣṭādaśanāḍīmitacaturdaśīsattve /
GSD36mvir_sau:3198: mādhavastu idaṃ vacanaṃ yatra bhūtaviddhā kartavyā yathā sāvatrīvrate tatrāṣṭādaśanāḍīmitā na grāhyetyevaṃparamityāha /
GSD36mvir_sau:3207: jyeṣṭhe māsi site pakṣe pūrṇimāyāṃ tayā vratam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3208: cīrṇaṃ purā mahābhaktyā kathitaṃ te mayā nṛpa/ //
GSD36mvir_sau:3210: amāyāṃ ca tathā jyeṣṭhe vaṭamūle tathā satī /
GSD36mvir_sau:3215: meṣe vā vṛṣabhe vāpi sāvitrīṃ tāṃ vinirdiśet /
GSD36mvir_sau:3219: śrāvaṇīṃ paurṇamāsīṃ prakṛtyāmnāte rakṣābandhane tu aparāhṇavyāpinī grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3225: anye tu aṅgatve pramāṇābāvāt tata ityasya cākhaṇḍaparvāṇi arthasiddhatvenāvidheyatvānna grahasaṅkrāntyādivarjanamityāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3227: bhadrāyāṃ dve na kartavye śrāvaṇī phālgunī tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3230: śrāvaṇyāṃ śravaṇe jātaḥ pūrvaṃ hayaśirā hariḥ /

GSD36mvir_sau:5206: saṃsarpaśca na malamāsaḥ kintu śuddhaḥ uttarastvaśuddhaḥ /

GSD36mvir_sau:5296: gauḍāstu na nityapadenāvaśyakartavyapārvaṇaśrāddhādigrahaṇaṃ tathā sati pretaśrāddhāderapi tata eva kartavyatāsiddhau teṣāṃ pṛthaggrahaṇavaiyarthyāpatteḥ /

GSD36mvir_sau:5337: astaṃ gate gurau śukre bāle vṛddhe malimluce /

GSD36mvir_sau:5385: asūryo nāma ye māsā na teṣu mama sammatāḥ /

GSD36mvir_sau:5404: yastu khamāpanamiti brahmasiddhāntavacane samāptiniṣedhaḥ sa malamāsa eva mohāt prārabdhasya tasya tatraiva samāpane doṣātiśayapradarśanārtha ityādda /

GSD36mvir_sau:5497: tasmānmalaṃmāsamṛtasya punarmalamāse tatraiva pratyābdikaṃ kāryaṃ na śuddha ityeva vyākhyā jyāyasī bahusammatā ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5498: śuddhamāsamṛtānāṃ tu dvitīyādyābdikaṃ śuddha eva kāryaṃ prathamābdikaṃ tu mala eva /

GSD36mvir_sau:5595: yadā tvāśvinasyādhimāsatvaṃ tadāpi na kanyāsambandhabhrāntyā malināśvine mahālayaḥ kāryaḥ kintu bhādrāparapakṣa eva“anyatrava tu pañcamaḥ“ityabhidhānāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5596: na ca kanyāyogābhāve kathaṃ tatra śrāddhamiti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5597: sakalasya pakṣasya kanyāyogābhāve kathaṃ tatra śrāddhamiti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5598: sakalasya pakṣasya kanyāsambandhābhāve 'pi bhādrapadakṛṣṇapakṣasya kanyāsaṅkrāntisparśavattvena tatra śrāddhasyānuṣṭhānaṃ śakyatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5600: ante vā yadi vā madhye yatra kanyāṃ ravirvrajet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5601: sa pakṣaḥ sakalaḥ pūjyaḥ śrāddhaṃ tatra vidhīyate //

GSD36mvir_sau:5603: śūlapāṇyādimate tu kanyāsambandhanirapekṣasya pañcamapakṣasyaiva śrāddhakālatvādyuktameva tatra śrāddhānuṣṭhānam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5604_0: yattu tanmate kanyāgatāparapakṣe sakṛtkriyamāṇaśrāddhāntara tat kanyāgatāparapakṣasya
GSD36mvir_sau:5605: vastutastu kanyāgatāparapakṣaśrāddhaṃ na pañcamapakṣaśrāddhādbhinnaṃ śrāddhabhede vidhikalpanāgauravāpatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5606: pañcamapakṣasya“ante vā yadi vā madhya“iti vacanena kanyopalakṣitasyaiva śrāddhakālatvapratīteśca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5610: śrāvaṇabhādrayorhi malamāsatve pañcamapakṣasya kanyāsambandho na bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5611: tadā ca saptamapakṣasya vihitatvāt kanyopalakṣita eva śrāddhaprāptiriti na kāpi kṣatiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5613: yadā tu āśvinasya malinatvaṃ tadāpi pañcamapakṣasya kanyāsambandho 'styeva amāyāmeva kanyāpraveśāt tena ekameva śrāddhamiti yuktaṃ bahusammataṃ ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5614: tadapi cāśvinasya malinatve 'pi kanyopalakṣitasya mukhyasyaiva pañcamapakṣasya lābhāttatraiva kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5617: daivaṃ pitryaṃ tadā karma tulāsthe karturakṣayam //
GSD36mvir_sau:5618: iti jyotiḥ pitāmahavacanaṃ tulāstharavau kartavyatvabodhakaṃ tanmahālayātiriktavrīhipākādiśrāddhaparam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5619: athavā mahālayasya“yāvadvṛścikadarśanam“iti gauṇakāle 'pi vihitatvād gauṇakālabhrāntyā malināśvine kriyamāṇasya niṣedhadvārā tulāstharavau kartavyatābodhakam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5622: iti kartavyeṣu mahālayaparigaṇanaṃ kṛtaṃ tat mahālayākhyatīrthaparam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5624: atra ca jyotiḥ pitāmahavākye daivasyāpi kanyākartavyasya tulāyāṃ kartavyatvapratīterdurgāsthāpanādikamapi tatraiva kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5628: śete buddhyati vṛścike sa bhagavān māsaiścaturbhirhariḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5630: durgā caiva tulāgame samadhike śeṣāstadanye surāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:5636: dvirāṣāḍhaḥ sa vijñeyo viṣṇuḥ svapiti karkaṭe //
GSD36mvir_sau:5640: ityādistu gauṇo 'tra na grāhya iti bahavaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5651: bāle vā yadi vā vṛddhe śukre vāstaṃ gate ravau /
GSD36mvir_sau:5665: muṇḍanaṃ copavāsaṃ ca gautamyāṃ siṃhage ravau /
GSD36mvir_sau:5666: kanyāgate tu kṛṣṇāyāṃ na tu tattīravāsinām //
GSD36mvir_sau:5672: śaiśavaṃ prāk tu pañcāhaṃ paścāddaśadinaṃ smṛtam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5673: śaiśavaṃ vārddhakaṃ pakṣaṃ prāk paścācca bṛhaspateḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:5680: bahavau darśitāḥ kālā ye bālye vārddhake 'pi ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5687: vaṅgeṣu hūṇeṣu ca ṣaṭ ca pañca
GSD36mvir_sau:5692: na tyaktavyaṃ gayāśrāddhaṃ siṃhasthe ca bṛhaspatau /
GSD36mvir_sau:5699: surāsurejyāstamaye 'pi tīrthe yātrāvidhiḥ saṅkramaṇe ca śastaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:5705: darśaśrāddhaṃ tu yat proktaṃ pārvaṇaṃ tat prakīrttitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5706: aparāhṇe pitṝṇāṃ ca tatra dānaṃ praśasyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:5724: iti mātsyānusārāttarpaṇamevocyate na tu piṇḍapitṛyajña iti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5725: manuvacane pitṛyajñapadena tarpaṇasya grahaṇe piṇḍānvāhāryapadasya nāmadheyatvānupapatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5731: tacca na medhātithyuktaṃ pañcamahāyajñāntargatapitṛyajñarūpaṃ tarpaṇaṃ tasya śrāddhadine prasaṅgasiddhatvana tatpaścādbhāvavidhānānupapatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5733: tatpaścāddhāvo 'pi ca yadyapi snātasya śrāddhavidhānāttarpaṇasya ca snānāṅgatvāt prāpta eva tathāpi--
GSD36mvir_sau:5735: śrāddhaṃ vā pitṛyajñaḥ syāt pitryo balirathāpi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5736: iti vacanoktatriprakārapitṛyajñaprāptau jalatarpaṇapunarvacanaṃ sāgnikasya śrāddhadine pitṛyajñāntaravyāvṛttyarthamiti gauḍāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5737: anye tu snānaprayogāntargatasya tarpaṇasya kātīyānāmeva prāpteranyeṣāṃ snānaprayogāntarbhāve pramāṇābhāvāt prasajyeta kadācicchrāddhottaraṃ tarpaṇam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5738: ataśca tanniyamārthatve sambhavati parisaṅkhayāvidhyayogājjalatarpaṇottarabhāva eva matsyapurāṇavākye niyamyata
GSD36mvir_sau:5742: tādṛśaṃ ca tat piṇḍapitṛyajñādhikāriṇaḥ sāgnikasyaiva sambhavatīti tadbiṣayamevedaṃ jhandogapariśiṣṭavacanaṃ manuvacanaṃ ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5743: na tu sarvaviṣayam itarān prati tatsamākhyāsambhavāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5744: ata eva pariśiṣṭokto vāsaratṛtīyāṃśarūpo 'parāṅṇaḥ piṇḍapitṛyajñādhikāriṇa āhitāgnereva /
GSD36mvir_sau:5745: “nātisandhyāsamīpata“ityapi ca dināntyamuhūrta eva taṃ prati niṣidhyate na tu sāyāhnarūpastrimuhūrtaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:5749: ayaṃ ca pariśiṣṭoktaḥ kālavidhiryeṣāṃ candradarśanavati pratipaddine darśeṣṭerniṣedhasteṣāmeveti pariśiṣṭaprakāśakāraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5750: tena tādṛśānuṣṭhānakarttṝn sāgnikān prati yā gakālānurodhenāmāvāsyā parisiṣṭānusāreṇa mirṇīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:5752: candrakṣaye tu prāśastyamātraṃ“kṣīṇe rājani śasyate“iti vacanāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5766: tadanta eva kṣayameti kṛtsna eva jyotiścakravido vadanti //
GSD36mvir_sau:5773: tṛtīyayā caturthabhāgonatvāt tribhāgamātrāvaśiṣṭayā kalayā paridṛśyo 'nayorapi amāvāsyayorādyayāme na jāyeta kintu itaramāsavadatrānayoraṇyāmāvāsyayoḥ kṣaya ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5778_1: tadasparśena ekadeśavyāptyā vā bhavati tatra tadasparśacaturdaśyapekṣayāmāvāsyāyāḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:5779: tatra yā tāvat pūrvedyureva kṛtsnakālavyāpinī paredyuśca tadekadeśamapi na spṛśāti sā pūrvaiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:5780: yāpi tādṛsyevottaratra tade kadeśavyāpinī sāpi pūrvaiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:5781: paraṃ yadi yajanīyadine candradarśanādekadeśa vyāptidina eva yāgaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5782: yadi tu tithivṛddhyā candrādarśanāt pratipadyeva yāgastadā ekadeśavyāptidina eva kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5789: yā tu paredyureva kutsnakālavyāpinī pūrvedyustadekadeśasparśena tadasparśena vā vidyamānā sottaraiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:5791: yā tu dinadvaye 'pi vaiṣamyeṇaikadeśavyāpinī sā yaivādhikā saiva grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5792: yā tu dinadvaye sāmyenaikadeśavyāpinī sā yadi kṣayeṇa tādṛśī tadā“yadā caturdaśīyāmaṃ“iti pūrvādāhṛtakṣīyamāṇavākyāt pūrvaiva,
GSD36mvir_sau:5798: evaṃ yadā sāmyena tādṛsī tadāpi darśanādarśanakṛta eva nirṇayaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5799: yadā ca keṣucitpakṣeṣu caturdaśīmiśrāmāyāmanuṣṭhānaṃ prāpnoti tadā yadi amāpratīkṣayā sarvānuṣṭhānaṃ sambhavati tadā sā pratīkṣaṇīyā no ceccatuddeśyāmapi sarvamanuṣṭheyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5802: dinadvaye 'pyarāhṇavyāptau kṣaye pūrvā vṛddhau sāmye ca parā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5804: kṣaye pūrvā parā vṛddhau sāmya'pi ca parā smṛtā //
GSD36mvir_sau:5814: strībhiḥ śūdraiḥ kuhūḥ kāryā tathā cānagnikairdvijaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5819: dṛṣṭacandrā sinīvālī naṣṭacandrā kuhūḥ smṛtā / iti
GSD36mvir_sau:5832: aṣṭakā ityetaccāśvalāyanamate śrāddhahomayoḥ kātyāyanamate ca homamātrasya nāmadheyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5836: tathāpi sa“dravyaṃ brāhmaṇasampattiḥ“iti vadāśvalāyanoktasya kālasya lakṣaṇayā bodhakaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5840: evañca varṣe pañca aṣṭakā iti siddham /
GSD36mvir_sau:5841: āśvalāyanastu bhādrāṣṭakāyā māghyāvarṣamiti saṃjñāntaraṃ paraṃ kṛtavān /
GSD36mvir_sau:5843: evañcāśvalāyanīyairbhādrakṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ paurāṇāṣṭakā mādhyāvarṣaṃ ca tantreṇānuṣṭheyamiti nyāyavidaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5845: caturaṣṭako hemanta ityetacca triṛtuḥ saṃvatsara itye tatpakṣābhiprāyeṇa /
GSD36mvir_sau:5847: viṣṇvādismṛtau yatra tisro 'ṣṭakāstisro 'nvaṣṭakā ityetattrayāṇāmupādānaṃ tatra taddhemantagatānāmeva /
GSD36mvir_sau:5851: aindṣāṃ tu prathamāyāṃ ca śākaiḥ santarpayetpitṝn /
GSD36mvir_sau:5856: pauṣe kṛṣṇāṣṭakāyāṃ tu śākaiḥ santarpayet pitṝn /
GSD36mvir_sau:5857: itibrahmapurāṇavacanāntarāt pauṣakṛṣṇāṣṭakāyāṃ śākasantarpaṇokteḥ pauṣamāghaphālgunagatā eva tisra uktā bhavanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5858: kūrmapurāṇe tu pauṣādigā eva tisra iti spaṣṭamuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5865: evaṃ ca brahmapurāṇaviṣṇudharmottarayoḥ phālgunakṛṣṇāṣṭamīvyatiriktā hemantaśiśirayostisraḥ uktā iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5868: kṛṣṇapakṣe variṣṭhā hi pūrvā caindrī vibhāvyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:5871: śākaiḥ kāryā tṛtīyā syādeṣa dravyagato vidhiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5872: yā cāpyanyā caturthī syāttāṃ ca kuryādviśeṣataḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:5875: śākaṃ tu phālgunāṣṭamyāṃ svayaṃ patnyapi vā pacet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5876: ityanena phālgunāṣṭamyāḥ śākāṣṭakātvena pratyabhijñānānmārgaśīrṣāṣṭakāparityāgena tisra uktāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5882: caturthī tu bhādrakṛṣṇāṣṭamyeva na tu phālgunakṛṣṇāṣṭamī kathamanyathā“etāstisra“iyaṃ caturthī“iti brūyāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5883: gobhilavat prathamata eva catasra iti na vadediti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5885: aśaktau tu“ekasyāṃ vā“ityāśvalāyanasūtroktaikā purāṇoktā ca bhādrakṛṣṇāṣṭamīti dve /
GSD36mvir_sau:5887: “yā māghyāḥ paurṇamāsyā upariṣṭāt dvyaṣṭakā tasyāmaṣṭamī jyeṣṭhayā sambadhyate tāmekāṣṭaketyācakṣate“ityāpastambenai kasyā eva phālgunāṣṭamyā uktatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5889: sā prakāradvayena vyākhyātā tadbhāṣyakṛtā malamāsatvena khaṇḍatithisattvena vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5890: jyeṣṭhayā sambadhyata iti pradarśanārthaṃ na tu yadaiva jyeṣṭhāyuktā tadaivopādeyā nānyadetyevamarthamiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5904: āsvalāyanena ca pūrvedyuḥ pitṛbhyo dadyāditi aṣṭakāśrāddhātpūrvedyuḥ śrāddhāntaramuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5936: nāniṣṭvā tu pitṝn śrāddhe karma vaidikamārabhet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5938: atra nāniṣṭvetivacanenaiva sarvatra nāndīśrāddhaprāptau yajñodvāhapratiṣṭhāsvityādipunarvacanaṃ niyamārtham /
GSD36mvir_sau:5940: na cotpattiviniyogābhyāṃ sāptadaśya iva sārthakatobhayorapi viniyojakatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5954: śrāddhatrayaṃ tu kurvīta vaiśvadevaṃ ca tāntrikam //
GSD36mvir_sau:5958: tato mātāmahānāṃ ca vṛddhau śrāddhatrayaṃ smṛtam //
GSD36mvir_sau:5983: śastreṇa tu hatā ye vai tebhyastatra pradīyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:5993: aparapakṣe kurvītorddhvraṃ vā caturthyā yadahaḥ sampadyeteti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5995: yadāpyekadine tadāmāvāsyāśrāddhātpṛthak kāryam“amāvāsyāṣṭakā vṛddhiḥ kṛṣṇapakṣe“iti pṛthaṅnirddeśāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6000: dviścaturvā yathāśrāddhaṃ māse māse dine dine //
GSD36mvir_sau:6012: ata eva gautamenānekān kālānabhidhāyoktam--kālanithamaḥ śaktita iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:6021: tribhāgahīnaṃ pakṣaṃ vā tribhāgaṃ tvarddhameva vā //
GSD36mvir_sau:6030: evaṃ caikasminneva dine śrāddhayogyatithidvayalābhe śrāddhadvayaṃ tithivṛddhau ca śrāddhāvṛttiḥ kṛtatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6043: yeṣāṃ caturdaśyāṃ śrāddhaṃ nāsti teṣāṃ pañcamyādidaśamyā dikalpau /
GSD36mvir_sau:6051: bhānūpādhyāyastu yeṣāṃ caturdaśyāṃ śrāddhaṃ nāsti teṣāṃ dvādaśyādiḥ kalpaḥ yeṣāṃ tadasti teṣāṃ trayodaśyādirityāha /
GSD36mvir_sau:6052: vastutastu asya vākyasyānekakālopadeśamātre tātparyādgurulaghukālopadeśasyārthikatvāduttarottaralaghukālopadeśakatvābhāvāt tribhāgamityatra bhāgitayā buddhisthīkṛtasya
GSD36mvir_sau:6055: iti gautamaikavākyatayā mūlaśrutikalpanālāghavācca ardhaṃ pakṣārdhamityeva vyākhyānamucitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6056: atra pakṣaśrāddhādikalpānāṃ gurulaghukalpatvenecchāvikalpāsambhavādekādayo tisro deyā itivatphalatāratamyamiti śrāddhavivekaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6057: nitye phalābhāvānna phale tāratamyaṃ kintu śaktyapekṣayā vyavatthito vikalpaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6058: ekakalpāśrayaṇe ca tadanirvāhena kalpāntarāśrayaṇe tasminprayoge tasyaiva pakṣasya kathañcinnirvāhyatvādvrīhiyavādivaditimiśrāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6060: nityasyāpi kathāñcitphalavattvācchaktasya laghukalpāśrayaṇe phalābhāvakalpanāyā anyāyyatvāt ṣoḍaśigrahaṇādāvatiprasakteśca /
GSD36mvir_sau:6061: atra ca dine dina iti vīpsāśravaṇāccaturdaśyāmapi pārvaṇaṃ kāryaṃ“vajeyitvā caturdaśīm“iti niṣedhastu aparapakṣāntaracaturdaśīviṣaya iti pradīpavivekau /
GSD36mvir_sau:6068: yo vai śrāddhaṃ naraḥ kuryādekasminnapi vāsare //
GSD36mvir_sau:6071: atra kanyāsaṃsthatvavacanaṃ prāśastyārthaṃ na tu tasyaiva śrāddhakālatvam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6073: śrāddhaṃ tatra prakurvīta kanyāṃ gacchatu vā na vā //
GSD36mvir_sau:6076: madhye vā yadi vāpyante yatra kanyāṃ ravirvrajet /
GSD36mvir_sau:6077: sa pakṣaḥ sakalaḥ pūjyaḥ śrāddhaṃ tatra vidhīyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:6082: nabho vātha nabhasyo vā malamāso yadā bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:6084: iti nāgarakhaṇḍokteḥ saptamapakṣa eva tat nyāyyamityuktaṃ malamāsakartavyanirṇaye /
GSD36mvir_sau:6099: ata eva brahmavāyupurāṇayoḥ paurṇamāsyāditithiṣoḍaśakasya phalamuktamityuktaṃ kāmarūpanibandhe /
GSD36mvir_sau:6100_0: atha vā yadā tithivṛddhyā ṣoḍaśadinātmakaḥ pakṣaḥ syāttadā vṛddhidine 'pi śrāddhaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:6114: eṣu śrāddhaṃ na kurvīta gṛhī putradhanakṣayāt //
GSD36mvir_sau:6117: prājāpatye ca pauṣṇe ca pitryarkṣe bhārgave tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:6118: yastu śrāddhaṃ prakurvīta tasya putro vinaśyati //
GSD36mvir_sau:6125: tathā tithiṃ ca nakṣatraṃ vāraṃ ca na vicārayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:6130: yā tithiryasya māsasya mṛtāhe tu pravartate /
GSD36mvir_sau:6131: sā tithiḥ pitṛpakṣe tu pūjanīyā prayatnataḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:6133: piṇḍaśrāddhaṃ ca kartavyaṃ vicchitiṃ naiva kārayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:6137: atra pratidinaṃ śrāddhakaraṇe nandādi na varjyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6139: naiva nandādi varjyaṃ syānnaiva varjyā caturdaśī //
GSD36mvir_sau:6143: caturdaśyāṃ kriyā kāryā anyeṣāṃ tu vigarhitā //
GSD36mvir_sau:6148: śastreṇa tu hatā yevai tebhyastatra pradīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:6151: nandādivarjanaṃ tu pañcamyādipakṣeṣu na bhavati vibhāgādiparimāṇahāniprasaṅgāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6157: ata ūrddhvaṃ tu kanyāyā yānyahāni tu ṣoḍaśa /
GSD36mvir_sau:6161: sūrye kanyāsthite śrāddhaṃ yo na kuryādgṛhāśramī /
GSD36mvir_sau:6163: ityādivacanaiḥ pañcamapakṣanirapekṣameva kanyānimittakaṃ śrāddhāntaraṃ vidhīyate tasya cāparapakṣa eva kanyāsaṅkramaṇe tantraṃ,
GSD36mvir_sau:6173: sa pakṣaḥ sakalaḥ pūjyaḥ śrāddhaṣoḍaśakaṃ prati /
GSD36mvir_sau:6174: iti karmaṇi saṅkhyāśravaṇaṃ na tadbhedakaṃ tasyaikadeśakanyāsambandhamātreṇāpi sakalapakṣapūjyatvaguṇaparatvena karmotpattiparatvā bhāvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6177: itivīpsāvaśāt“tribhāgahīnaṃ pakṣaṃ vā“ityādiṣu atyantasaṃyogadvitīyāvaśāt“sa pakṣaḥ sakalaḥ pūjya“itisakalādiśabdavaśādabhyasapratīteśca /
GSD36mvir_sau:6178: evaṃ ca kālabhedātsāyamprātaḥ kālayoḥ sāṅgahomaprayogāvṛttivatsarvāsu tithiṣu sāṅgaśrāddhāvṛttiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6180: evaṃ ca yadabhyāsapakṣe 'ntedakṣiṇādānaṃ brāhmaṇaikyaṃ ceti hemādriṇoktaṃ taccintyam /

GSD36mvir_sau:8032: ayaṃ cāpakarṣaḥ sapiṇḍanaṃ vinā pitrādīnāṃ pārvaṇārhapitṛtvaprāptyabhāvena nāndīśrāddhasya kartumaśakyatvāt
GSD36mvir_sau:8033: jñeyo na tu vācanika iti kecit /
GSD36mvir_sau:8034: apare tu na hyadṛṣṭārthe hetunā prayojanam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8035: na hyapakarṣe devatāsambhavaḥ prayojakaḥ kintu vidhiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8036: devatāyā abhāve tu jīvatpitṛkasyeva karmalopa eva yuktaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8040: kiñcāhitāgnairdaihitrasya vidyamāne 'pi niragnau mātule pārvaṇānuroghena mātāmahasapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ prāpnuyāddauhitrānurodhena vā mātulasya gauṇakāle 'nuṣṭhānaprasaṅgaḥ,
GSD36mvir_sau:8055: na cāstu saptamī paraṃ tu satisaptamī sā,
GSD36mvir_sau:8056: evaṃ ca māsikābdikādiśrāddhavanmṛtatithisajātīyāyāṃ tithau sapiṇḍīkaraṇa miti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8057: “upapadavibhakteḥ kārakavibhaktirbalīyasī“itinyāyātsa tisaptamīto 'dhikaraṇasaptamyā eva balīyastvātpūraṇārthakapratyayabalā hvitīyapakṣasyaiva lābhāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:8058_0: na ca“pūrṇe saṃvatsare ṣaṇmāse tripakṣe yadaharvā vṛddhirāpadyate“iti gobhilavākye
GSD36mvir_sau:8061: hemādristu pakṣatraye pūrṇa iti vadannapi tṛtīyapakṣasampūrttidinasyaivādhikaraṇatvamāha saptamīsvārasyāt na tu taduttaradinasyeti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8071: atrārvākdarśādityuktāvapi“ekādaśāhe dvādaśāhe vā“ityādi baudhāyanādyuktavihitakāla eva kartavyaṃ,
GSD36mvir_sau:8081: ddhāviṃśatidinādūrdhvaṃ bhavati tadāśaucātparato dvādaśasu divaseṣu ṣoḍaśaśrāddhāni kṛtvā trayodaśadivase sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8083: māsikārthavat dvādaśāhaṃ śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā trayodaśe 'hni vā kuryāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:8088: tatronamāsikatraipakṣikonaṣāṇmāsikāni prathamadvitīyaṣaṣṭhadvādaśādivaseṣu kāryāṇi divasasya māsa tthānīyatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:8089_0: ata evāgre“saṃvatsarābhyantare yadyadhikamāsako bhavettadā māsikārthaṃ dinamekaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:8089_1: vardhayet“iti tenaivoktam dvādaśāhaṃ trayodaśa iti cāśaucottaradinamārabhyaiva“parato
GSD36mvir_sau:8091: tatā sāgninā pravasitena vicchinnāgninā vā pārvaṇaśrāddhānurodhenāpi apakarṣaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8095: na pārvaṇaṃ nābhyudayaṃ kurvanna labhate phalam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8098: etacca yanmate piṇḍapitṛyajñanimittaṃ sapiṇḍīkaraṇāpakarṣaṇaṃ tanmate 'pi pituriva māturapi kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8099: ekatvaṃ sā gatā bharttuḥ piṇḍe gotre ca sūtake /
GSD36mvir_sau:8107: anyathā mātāmahena saha sapiṇḍane mātāmahapiṇḍabhoktṛtvaṃ na syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:8110: tasmātsāgninā kartrā āśaucottaraṃ dvādaśasu divaseṣu māsikāni kṛtvā trayodaśe 'hni maraṇadinādārabya vā dvādaśe dine ekādaśe 'hani eva vā darśapāte tatraiva sapiṇḍanaṃ kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8111: atra ca pramādādakaraṇe tripakṣādiṣu vihiteṣu kāleṣu kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8117: tasyaiva dvādaśāhādīnāṃ mukhyatvāt tadagrimāṇāmanukalpatvena vidhānamuktaṃ na tu niragnikasya /
GSD36mvir_sau:8121: dvādaśe 'hani ṣaṣṭhe vā tripakṣe vā trimāsi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8125: baudhāyanaḥ--atha saṃvatsare pūrṇe sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ tripakṣe tṛtīyamāsi ṣaṣṭhe vaikādaśe vā dvādaśāhe veti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8126: atrāpi pūrvoktayuttyādhikaraṇatve siddhe yadatīte ṣaṣṭhe māsīti kasyacidvyākhyānaṃ tatra mūlaṃ mṛgyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8131: māsikārthavat dvādaśāhaṃ śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā trayodaśe 'hni vā kuryāta /
GSD36mvir_sau:8136: asthitiśca rājopadravādinā deśatyāgasambhāvanārūpā rogādinā karmāsāmarthyarūpā vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8137: prāśastyaṃ ca mukhyakālānuṣṭhiteneva tasmin kāle 'nuṣṭhitenāpyanena pretatva nivṛttirbhavatīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8138: dvādaśāhaśca dvādaśañca tadahaścetivyutpattyā dvādaśaṃ dinaṃ tacca mṛtadināvadhikameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:8139: dvādaśānāmahnāṃ saṅghāto dvādaśāhaḥ ṣoḍaśaśrāddhāpakarṣakaḥ kālaḥ sa cābhyudayarūpa iti śūlapāṇiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8140: nanu kathamasya praśastatvaṃ sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ hi pitṛtvaprāptyarthaṃ na ca dvādaśāhe kṛtaṃ kevalaṃ tatpitṛtvāpādakaṃ bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:8151: ataḥ pūrvaṃ kṛte 'pi sapiṇḍane vatsarānta eva pretatvanivṛtteḥ kathamasya praśastatbamiticet,
GSD36mvir_sau:8152: ṣoḍaśaśrāddhānyakṛtvā kṛte sapiṇḍane na pitṛtvaprāptirityetatparamidaṃ vacanadvayam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8157: nanu ṣoḍaśaśrāddhānyapakṛṣya kṛte sapiṇḍana pretatvanivṛtterjātatvātpunarmāsikodakumbhaśrāddhaṃ na syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:8161: māsikaṃ codakumbhaṃ ca deyaṃ tasyāpi vatsaram //
GSD36mvir_sau:8164: kecittu vṛddhinimittaṃ vināpakṛṣṭe sapiṇḍane saṃvatsarānta eva pretatvanivṛttiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8170: pretatvācceha nistīrṇāḥ prāptā pitṛgaṇaṃ tu te //
GSD36mvir_sau:8172: yadi vāśavatyā gauṇekāle 'nuṣṭhāna daivāttaduttaraṃ vṛddhyādyāpadyeta tadā vṛddhikālaṃ prāpya pretatvaparihāro bhavati tasya vatsarāntakālatulyatvāditi vadanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8175: yadi cāhitāgnerdvādaśāhasyeva mukhyatvena pretatvanivṛttiphalakasya sapiṇḍanasyātra vihitatvāditi,
GSD36mvir_sau:8177: mukhyakālaśca na svarūpeṇa prayojakaḥ anyathā vatsarānte sapiṇḍanābhāve 'pi pretatvanivṛttiḥ syādeva tasmānmakhyakāle 'nuṣṭhitameva sapiṇḍanaṃ pretatvanivartakaṃ vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8178: evaṃ sati vihitasyānarthakatvānupapattyā vihitakāle 'nuṣṭhitameva pretatvanivartakamityastu kṛtaṃ mukhyatvenota /
GSD36mvir_sau:8181: kecittu sarveṣāmapi kālānāhitāgniṃ prati mukhyatvena dvādaśādikāleṣu kṛtaṃ sapiṇḍanaṃ vṛddhipūrvaṃ kṛtamiva pretatvanivartakamiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8187: kecittu idaṃ sakalasādhāraṇamukhyakālasaṅgrāhakaṃ na tu niragnerekādaśāhādipratipādakam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8189: evaṃ ca“yā tupūrvamamāvāsyā“ityādivākyaistāṃstān prati prāprāneva kālān vidadhannāpūrvaśrutimūlamityāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8193: dvādaśe 'hani ṣaṣṭhe vā tripakṣe vā trimāsi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8200: anye tu vatsarānto mukhyastatsannihita ekādaśo māso jaghanyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8202: yadā ca sapiṇḍīkaraṇārthaṃ ṣoḍaśaśrāddhānyapakṛṣyante tadā mṛtatithisajātīyāyāṃ tithau kāryāṇi /
GSD36mvir_sau:8204: asambhave tu sapiṇḍanadine eva nimitte sannidhānāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:8205: atha vā sati kālavyavadhāne prāgudāhṛtaviṣṇuvākyāt dvādaśasu divaseṣu
GSD36mvir_sau:8212: iti vidhānānmāsaṃ śūdrasyāśaucasattvādavayavapiṇḍasya daśamasya taṃ prati sūtakānte vihitatvāt kathaṃ dvādaśāhe śūdrasya sapiṇḍanamitivācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8214: ityetatpakṣamāśritya vā sacchūdrasya darśaśrāddhānurodhena ekādaśāhavidhivadvacanabalātsūtakanivṛttimabhyupetya vā vacanāt sūtakamadhya eva vā kāryamiti na doṣaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8216_0: vastuto dvādaśāhapadaṃ na maraṇadinādārabhya dvādaśāhaparaṃ kintu sūtakāntadivasādūrdhvaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:8216_1: dvijātivat dvādaśasu divaseṣu dvādaśa māsikāni kṛtvā dvādaśāha eva sapiṇḍanaṃ kāryaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:8217: ata eva tatroktam--yadyadhimāsastadā trayodaśe dina iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8221: deśāntaragatānāṃ ca putrāṇāṃ ca kathaṃ bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:8222: śrutvā tu vapanaṃ kāryaṃ daśāhaṃ tu tilodakam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8227: raudrahaste ca rohiṇyāṃ maitrabhe vā samācaret //
GSD36mvir_sau:8231: śrāddhaṃ ca trividhaṃ pārvaṇamekoddiṣṭaṃ daivikaṃ ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:8234: trīnuddiśya tu yattaddhi pārvaṇaṃ munayo viduḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8238: tatra yasyāṃ tithau pārvaṇaśrāddhaṃ vihitaṃ sā yadi dinadvayasambandhinībhavettadā yasminpūrvasminparasminvā dine 'parāhṇavyāpinī tasmin dine pārvaṇamanuṣṭheyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8240: tayā karmāṇi kurvīta hrāsavṛddhī na kāraṇam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8249: sā pitṛbhyo yato dattā hyaparāhṇaḥ svayaṃbhuvā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8250: yasyāmaparāhṇasambandhinyāṃ ravirastaṃ yāti sā pitṛkārye praśaste tyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8253: sā grāhyā pitṛkārye tu na pūrvāstānuyāyinī //
GSD36mvir_sau:8255: tathā ca yāparāhṇavyāpinyastānuyāyinī sā pitṛkārye grāhyetyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8256: yadā tu dinadvaye 'pi nāparāhṇavyā pinī tadāpi pūrvaiva grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8263: mūlaṃ hi pitṛtṛptyarthaṃ paitraṃ coktaṃ maharṣibhiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8265: titheḥ prāntaṃ surākhyaṃ hi upoṣyaṃ kavayo viduḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8266: pitryaṃ mūlaṃ titheḥ proktaṃ śāstrajñaiḥ kālakovidaiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8268: na tatraudayikī grāhyā daive hyaudayikī tithiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8270: sāyāhnavyāpinī yā tu pārvaṇe sā uhāhṛtā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8273: udite daivataṃ bhānau pitryaṃ cāstamite ravau /
GSD36mvir_sau:8275: bhānāvudite sati yad dvimuhūrtaṃ muhūrtadvayaṃ taddaivataṃ = daivakarmayogyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8276: astamite astaṃ gantumārabdhe bhānau astamayātpūrvaṃ yat trimuhūrtaṃ tatpitryaṃ = pitryakarmayogyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8278: dinadvaye 'pi vaiṣamyeṇāparāhṇaikadeśavyāptau tadādhikyavatī grāhyā “aṇurapi viśeṣo 'dhyavasāyakara'; iti nyāyāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:8280: dinadvaye 'pi sāmyenāparāhṇaikadeśavyāptiśca śrāddhāṅgatithervṛdhdyā kṣayeṇa sāmyena vā bhavati,
GSD36mvir_sau:8288: atra sarvatvādīnāṃ grāhyatithigatatvaṃ kharvadarpayoḥ parayorhisāyāśca pūrvasyā grāhyatvābhidhānāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:8289_1: yadā viṃśatighaṭīparimitā pūrvatithir bhavati dvāviṃśatighaṭīparimitā cottaratithistadā
GSD36mvir_sau:8293: yadā ca pūrvottaradinayoḥ pūrvottare tithī ekaviṃśatighaṭīparamite stastadāpi sāmyenaiva ghaṭītrayaparimitāparāhṇaikadeśavyāptirbhavati tithiśca sāmyamupaiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8294: atra vṛddhisāmyayoḥ parā grāhyā kṣaye pūrveti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8297: āmaśrāddhaṃ tu pūrvāhṇa ekoddiṣṭaṃ tu madhyataḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8304: vidhijño vidhimāsthāya rauhiṇaṃ tu na laṅghayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:8307: madhyāhnavyāpinī yā tu tithiḥ pūrvā parāpi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8308: tasyāṃ pitṛbhyo dātavyaṃ hāsavṛddhī na kāraṇam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8325: prātaḥkāle tu na śrāddhaṃ prakurvīta dvijottamaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8327_1: śrāddheṣu prātaḥ kālasya niṣedhāttadatiriktapūrvāhṇo daivikaśrāddhakālaḥ tadvyāptyaiva pūrvavannirṇayaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8328: viśeṣastu yadā vṛddhikṣayādibhirdinadvaye 'pi tulyakālā karmakālavyāptistadottaraiva grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8329: udite daivataṃ bhānau pitrye cāstamite ravau /
GSD36mvir_sau:8339: āvartanaṃ nāma dinamadhyaṃ tathā ca āvartanāvadhikaḥ pūrvo bhāgaḥ pūrvahṇastadavadhikaḥ paro bhāgo 'parāhṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8348: pūrvāhṇo vai devānāṃ madhyandino manuṣyāṇāmaparāhṇaḥ pitṝṇāṃ tasmādaparāhṇe dadātīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8349_1: pramāṇāntarāpratītatvātpūrvāhṇe devebhyo dadāti madhyandine manuṣyebhya iti vidhī kalpyete iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8352: pūrvāhṇaḥ prathamaḥ prokto madhyāhnastu tataḥ paraḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8358: pūrvāhṇaḥ praharaṃ sārddhaṃ madhyāhnaḥ praharaṃ tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8361: pañcadhā vibhāgadyotikā śatapathaśrutiḥ--ādityastveva sarva ṛtavaḥ sa yadaivodetyatha vasanto yathā
GSD36mvir_sau:8362: saṅgavo 'tha grīṣmo yathā madhyandino 'tha varṣā yadāparāhno 'tha śaradyadaivāstametyatha hemanta iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8371: ahno muhūrtā vijñeyā daśa pañca ca sarvadāṃ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8373: ahnastriṃśadghaṭīparimitatve nyūnādhikatve vā muhūrtāḥ pañcadaśaiveti sarvadetyasyārthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8375: raudraḥ śvetaśca maitraśca tathā sārabhaṭaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8387: madhyāhno 'pi tridhāvibhāge pañcamuhūrtaparimitaścaturdhāvibhāge praharapa rimitaḥ pañcadhāvibhāge trimuhūrtapāramita iti trividhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8394: ete ca pūrvāhṇādayastu tattatkarmasu yathāviniyojakaṃ yathālābhaṃ grāhyā yavabrīhyādivat /
GSD36mvir_sau:8398: kuṃ yatra gopatirgobhiḥ kārtsnyena tapati kṣaṇe /
GSD36mvir_sau:8399: sa kālaḥ kutapo jñeyastatra dattaṃ mahāphalam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8403: sarvapṛthivītāpakatvaṃ khamadhyagatasya sūryasya bhavatīti tadupalakṣitaḥ kālaḥ kutapaśabdenocyata ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8408: sa kālaḥ kutapo jñeyaḥ pitṝṇāṃ dattamakṣayam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8411: tilā darbhāśca madhyāhno navaite kupāḥ smṛtāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8422: rātrau śrāddhaṃ na kurvīta rākṣasī kīrttitā hi sā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8434: caturthe prahare prāpte śrāddhaṃ tatra na kārayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:8439: yattvatra śūlapāṇyādibhiruktaṃ na vikalpabhiyā paryudāsāṅgīkaraṇaṃ vidhiniṣedhayoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣarūpatvena tulyabalatvābhāvāt tadaprasakteḥ,
GSD36mvir_sau:8444: eteṣāṃ ca paryudāsatvam amāvāsyāvidhiśeṣatayā rātryādītarāmāvāsyāyāmi ti śūlapāṇiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8450: te hi ahorātraṃ vinā karmakaraṇāśaktestadvadahorātraparā bhavanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8454: purāṇeṣvapi ca“adya janmāṣṭamīṃ prāpya“iti sahkalpavākyaṃ sāvanadinasya vidhiṃ sūcayati /
GSD36mvir_sau:8456: nanu paryudāsasyāpi paryudasanīyaprāptisāpekṣatvātsarvaśrāddheṣu ca pūrvāhṇāparāhṇāditattadvelānāṃ niyatatvena rātryādiprāptyabhāvātkathamete paryudāsā iti cet,
GSD36mvir_sau:8469: darśaprakaraṇagatasyāpi ca niṣedhasya prakaraṇe niveśāmbhavādutkarṣa iti kecit /
GSD36mvir_sau:8471_1: sāmānyataḥ prāpnoti na tu grahaṇādivattatpuraskārema vidhirastīti tatra vikalpaprasattyabhāvātsa
GSD36mvir_sau:8474: ityādivacanaṃ tadapi vāśabdopanibandhādvacanāntaraparyudastaparātreranyatra prāptaprātassāyāhnādigauṇakālasyāpi mukhyatvadyotanārthaṃ na punā rātrāvapi tatkartavyatāparamityāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8475_0: apare tu prakaraṇābādhe sambhavati tadvādhasyāyogātprakṛtāveva daivānmānuṣādvā pratibandhādasamāpte
GSD36mvir_sau:8475_1: śrāddhe yadi ravirastamiyāttadā prārabdhatvādrātrāvapi tatsamāpane prasakte na naktaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:8476: tathā ca sāmikṛtameva sthāpayitvā paredyuḥ kṛtvātatsamāpanīyaṃ yajamānenāpi ca taduttarameva bhoktavyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8479: vastutastu aparāhṇādividhayo na niyamārthāḥ kintu prāśastyātiśayārthāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8481: aparāhṇe pitṝṇāṃ tu tatra dānaṃ praśasyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:8483: ataśca teṣāmaniyatatvāttatra sarvabelānāṃ prasaktau yukte rātriparyudāsaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8492: vidhijño vidhimāsthāya rauhiṇaṃ tu na laṅghayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:8498: dināṣṭamabhāgāntyamuhūrtayoḥ punarniṣedhāt na tu sarvathā vihitatvameva rātriprātaḥ kālavat /
GSD36mvir_sau:8503: bhavatu vā ekodiṣṭavṛddhyādiṣu madhyāhnaprātarādiśrutirniyamārthā aparāhṇaśrutistu pārvaṇe pūrvodāhṛtavākyaiḥ prāśastyātiśayārthaiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:8505: atra ca pārvaṇasyāparāhṇakālatve 'pi prārambhaḥ kutapa eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:8506: ahno muhūrtā vijñeyā daśa pañca ca sarvadā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8507: tatrāṣṭamo muhūrto yaḥ sa kālaḥ kutapaḥ smṛtaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8514: etasyāpi ca vikṛtibhūte pārvaṇe vyavasthā smaryate mārkaṇḍeyena--
GSD36mvir_sau:8516: kṛṣṇapakṣāparāhṇe tu rauhiṇaṃ tu na laṅghayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:8519: idaṃ hi vacanaṃ śuklapakṣasambandhināṃ yugamanvādisāṃvatsarikādīnāṃ sarveṣā sarvasya prayogasya pūrvāhṇakālatvaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣasambandhināṃ cāparāhṇakālatvaṃ na vidadhāti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8521: naca kṛṣṇapakṣāṃśe 'nuvādaḥ śuklapakṣāṃśa eva tu prakṛtiprāptāparāhṇabādhenaiva pūrvāhṇavidhiriti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8523_1: ca taduttarabhāgasya pakṣabhedenopakramakālatvavyavasthāpanamevānena vākyena kriyata iti siddham /
GSD36mvir_sau:8525: dve śukle dve tathā kṛṣṇe yugādī kavayo viduḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8536: evamāmaśrāddhaṃ tu pūrvāhne ityatrāpi sa eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:8540: ayaṃ cāmaśrāddhe pūrvāhnavidhirdvijātikarttṛkāmaśrāddha eva na tu śūdrakarttṛkāmaśrāddhe 'pi /
GSD36mvir_sau:8555: vacanaṃ tu yadi sākaraṃ tadā sarvatrāmaśrāddhe pūrvāhṇavikalpitaṃ kālāntaraṃ vidhattāṃ na tu śūdrāmaśrāddhe kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8559: atra ca prātaḥkālaḥ pañcadhāvibhāgena pakṣāntareṣu prātarvibhāgābhāvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:8560: yastu tredhācaturdhāvibhaktadinādyabhāgayorapi kvacitprātaḥśabdaprayogaḥ sa gauṇa ityuktaṃ parvanirṇaye /
GSD36mvir_sau:8575: na coktavacane niṣedhānupapattiḥ tasya samūlatve vikalpenopapatteriti, tanna /
GSD36mvir_sau:8578: naca tripiṇḍapadena piṇḍamātravidhānaṃ tritvaṃ tu avayutyānuvāda iti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8579: bhavanmate niṣedhavākyasya nirmūlatvena piṇḍadānarūpaprākṛtāṅgasya punārvidhāne pūrvatvāpatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8580: piṇḍadānasya prādhānyapakṣe tu tasya śrāddhapadenaiva siddheḥ punarvidhāne
GSD36mvir_sau:8582: na ca niṣedhasya samūlatvāṅgīkāreṇaiva pākṣikatvopapādanārthaṃ piṇḍadānavidhiriti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8595: bharaṇīṣu ca kurvīta piṇḍanirvapaṇaṃ na hi /
GSD36mvir_sau:8599: asyāṃ śrāddhaṃ kṛtaṃ yena sa gayāśrāddhakṛdbhavet //
GSD36mvir_sau:8613: ityādīni śrāddhaniṣedhakāni vacanāni tadekavākyatayā śrāddhaniṣedhakāni vyākhyeyānīti kecit /
GSD36mvir_sau:8614: vastutastu hemādrau tithau vāre ca śrāddhasya bihitatvāttatprayuktaśrāddha eva piṇḍadānaniṣedhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8644: śāstraprāptasya piṇḍadānasya niṣedhe“natau paśau karoti“iti vadvikalpāpatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8647: atra hi anekāni śrāddhāni ekasmin vākye upādāya piṇḍadānaniṣedhaḥ śṛyamāṇo na tattacchrāddhaprakaraṇe paṭhita iti vaktuṃ śakyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:8651: ityādivākyeṣu smṛtyantaravihitaśrāddhānuvādena na piṇḍadānaṃ paryudatyate yenoktadoṣāvakāśaḥ syāt kintu apūrvakarmotpattiḥ kriyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:8671: māsaṃ samagraṃ parayā bhattyā snāyīta kārttike //
GSD36mvir_sau:8684: darśaṃ vā paurṇamāsīṃ vā prārabhya snānamācaret /
GSD36mvir_sau:8696: na tasya duritaṃ kiñcinnādhayo vyādhayo nṛpa/ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8699: kārttikāśvayuje māsi caitre vāpi tathā nṛpa/ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8705: āśvine māsi vai pūṇyā dvitīyā śuklapakṣagā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8721: māghe māsi tṛtīyāṃ guḍasya lavaṇasya ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:8729: māsi bhādrapade śuklā śivā lokeṣu pūjitā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8730: māsi māghe tathā śuklā yā caturthī mahīpate/ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8731: jñeyā sā śāntidā nityaṃ śāntiṃ kuryātsadaiva tu //
GSD36mvir_sau:8732: yadā śuklacaturthyāṃ tu vāro bhaumasya vai bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:8733: tadā sā sukhadā jñeyā sukhānāmeti kīrttitā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8743: śuklā mārgaśire puṇyā śrāvaṇe yā ca pañcamī /
GSD36mvir_sau:8747: yeyaṃ bhādrapade māsi ṣaṣṭhī tu bharatarṣabha/ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8760: māsi bhādrapade śuklā saptamī yā gaṇādhipa/ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8762: yā tu mārgaśire māsi śuklapakṣe tu saptamī /
GSD36mvir_sau:8783: tasyāṃ snānaṃ prakurvīta dānaṃ caiva viśeṣataḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8786: tasyāṃ vratādi kurvāṇo labhate vāñchitaṃ phalam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8793: caitre trayodaśī puṇyā tasyāṃ daśaguṇaṃ phalam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8798: māghasya kṛṣṇapakṣe yo dāne bahuphalā hi sā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8821: śuklapakṣe tu saptamyāṃ yadā saṅkramate raviḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8824: sarveṃ koṭiguṇaṃ proktaṃ bhāskarasya vaco yathā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8839: tadā sā tu mahāpuṇyā jayantī cāṣṭamī smṛtā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8850: nāmnā sā vijayā khyātā tithīnāmuttamā tithiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8851: yo dadāti tilaprasthaṃ prāpya kālaṃ tu vatsaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:8857: hastayuktā tu vaiśākhe jyeṣṭhe tu svātisaṃyutā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8858: jyeṣṭhayā tu tathāṣāḍhe mūlopetā tu vaiṣṇave //
GSD36mvir_sau:8860: tathā bhādrapade māsi śravaṇena ca saṃyutā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8868: māghyāṃ tu samatītāyāṃ śravaṇena tu seyutā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8869: dvādaśī yā bhavet kṛṣṇā proktā sā tilavaiṣṇavī //
GSD36mvir_sau:8886: mahatī pūrṇamāsī sā yuktā pūrṇendunā gurau //
GSD36mvir_sau:8889: paurṇamāsī tu mahatī proktā saṃvatsare tu sā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8893: pūrṇimā jīvavāre tu mahacchabdā hi sā tithiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8895: harikṣetre ca gaṅgāyāṃ sāmudre naimiṣe tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8898: aindre guruḥ śaśī caiva prājāpatye ravistathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8899: pūrṇamāsī tu sā jñeyā mahājyaiṣṭhīti kīrttitā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8901: āgneyaṃ ca yadā ṛkṣaṃ kārtikyāṃ tu bhavetkvacit /
GSD36mvir_sau:8903: yadā yāmyaṃ bhavedṛkṣaṃ puṇyaṃ tasyāṃ tithau kvacit /
GSD36mvir_sau:8905: prājāpatyaṃ yadā ṛkṣaṃ yadā tasyāṃ narādhipa/ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8907: mande vārke gurau vāpi vāreṣveteṣu ca triṣu /
GSD36mvir_sau:8908: trīṇyetāni ca ṛkṣāṇi proktāni vrahnaṇā svayam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8916: meṣasthasca yadā sauriḥ siṃhe ca gurucandramāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8917: bhāskaraḥ śravaṇākhye tu mahāmāghī tu sā smṛtā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8922: amā somena bhaumena guruṇā raviṇā tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8928: amāvāsyā yadā puṣye raudrarkṣe vā punarvasau /
GSD36mvir_sau:8932: māghāsite pañcagaśī kadācidupaiti yogaṃ yadi vāruṇena /
GSD36mvir_sau:8933: ṛkṣeṇa kālaḥ sa paraḥ pitṝṇāṃ na hyalpapuṇyairnṛpa/
GSD36mvir_sau:8945: divaiva yogaḥ śasto 'yaṃ na tu rātrau kadācana /
GSD36mvir_sau:8952: kapilāṃ ca dvijāgryāya dattvā kratuphalaṃ labhet //
GSD36mvir_sau:8954: bhādramāsyasite pakṣe bhānau caiva kare sthite /
GSD36mvir_sau:8955: pāte kuje ca rohiṇyāṃ sā ṣaṣṭhī kapilābhidhā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8959: ayaṃ ca yadā sampūrṇaḥ tadaiva puṇyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8961: saṃyoge tu caturṇāṃ tu nirddiṣṭā paraṇeṣṭhinā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8964: amāvāsyā tu somena saptamī bhānunā saha /
GSD36mvir_sau:8972: ekādaśyāṃ site pakṣe puṣyarkṣaṃ yadi jāyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:8975: śukle vā yadi vā kṛṣṇe caturthī vā caturdaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:8980: rātrau snānaṃ na kurvīta dānaṃ caiva viśeṣataḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8981: naimittikaṃ ca kurvīta snānaṃ dānaṃ ca rātriṣu //
GSD36mvir_sau:8984: madhyaṃ dine 'rdharātre ca śrāddhaṃ bhuktvā tu sāmiṣam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8990: tatra siṃhārke śuklacaturthyāṃ candradarśanaṃ na kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8998: ṣaṣṭhīṣu tailaṃ palamaṣṭamīṣu kṣaurakriyāṃ caiva caturdaśīṣu /
GSD36mvir_sau:9003: saptamyāṃ na spṛśettailaṃ nīlavastraṃ na dhārayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:9004: na cāpyāmalakaiḥ snānaṃ na kuryātkalahaṃ naraḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9013: atra sannihitaṃ pāpaṃ taile māṃse bhage kṣure //
GSD36mvir_sau:9017: iti smaraṇāt tato 'nyatra doṣābhāva iti, tanna /
GSD36mvir_sau:9020: tailaniṣedhe ca sarvatra tilatailasyaiva niṣedhaḥ tailapadasya tatraiva
GSD36mvir_sau:9026: caturdaśī aṣṭamī ca amāvāsyā ca pūrṇimā /
GSD36mvir_sau:9036: parvasu nādīyīta na māṃsamasnīyāt parvasu hi rakṣaḥpiśācavyabhicārivīnnatambinīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9041: tailaṃ māṃsaṃ vyavāyaṃ ca kṣuraṃ caiva vivarjayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:9044: bhage māṃse kṣure taile nityaṃ tiṣṭhati parvasu //
GSD36mvir_sau:9047: patraṃ vā pāṭayetteṣāṃ brahmahatyāṃ sa vindati //
GSD36mvir_sau:9058: vasyā vāsyā vasī vāsī amāpūrvā ameti ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:9069: māse nabhasyamāvāsyāṃ darbho grāhyo navaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9072: kuśāḥ śākaṃ ca puṣpāṇi gavārthe ca tṛṇādikam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9079: amāvāsyāsu sarvāsu navaṃ vastraṃ na dhārayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:9094: vastraṃ ca pīḍayennaiva kṣureṇāpi na hiṃsyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:9095: hemādrau tu caturthacaraṇe kareṇāpi hi budhyate iti pāṭhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9097: tailaṃ na saṃspṛśedāmaṃ vṛkṣādīn chedayenna ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:9098: pakṣādau ca ravau ṣaṣṭyāṃ riktāyāṃ ca tathā tithau //
GSD36mvir_sau:9108: nandāsu nābyaṅgamupācareta kṣauraṃ ca riktāsu jayāsu māṃsam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9109: pūrṇāsu yoṣit parivarjanīyā bhadrāsu sarvāṇi samārabheta //
GSD36mvir_sau:9111: nābhyaṅgamarke na ca bhūmiputre kṣīraṃ ca śukre ca kuje ca māṃsam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9112: budhena yoṣā na samācareta śeṣeṣu sarvāṇi sadaiva kuryāt //
GSD36mvir_sau:9113: citrāsu haste śravaṇeṣu tailaṃ kṣīraṃ viśākhāpratipatsu varjyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9119: na mṛcca nodakaṃ vāpi na niśāyāṃ tu gomayam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9121: ayaṃ ca niṣedhaḥ śaucādyatiriktakarmasu tatra mṛdgrahaṇasya vihita tvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:9124: ravibhavanasthe kāryaṃ jīve na kāryo vivāhastu //
GSD36mvir_sau:9129: siṃhe gurau siṃhalave vivāho neṣṭaśca godottarataśca yāvat /
GSD36mvir_sau:9136: supte viṣṇau nivartante kriyāḥ sarvāḥ śubhādikāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9139: puṇyāni yāni karmāṇi na syuḥ supte jagatpatau //
GSD36mvir_sau:9143: āhāraṃ maithunaṃ nidrāṃ svādhyāyaṃ ca caturthakam //
GSD36mvir_sau:9150: adhyetā narakaṃ yāti dātā nāpnoti tatphalam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9153: rātrau dānaṃ na kurvīta kadācidapi kena cit /
GSD36mvir_sau:9155: viśeṣato niśīthe tu na śubhaṃ karma śarmaṇe /
GSD36mvir_sau:9171: tailābhyaṅgo nārkavāre na bhaume no saṅkrāntau vaidhṛtau viṣṭiṣaṣṭhyoḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9172: parvasvaṣṭamyāṃ ca neṣṭaḥ sa iṣṭaḥ proktānmuktvā vāsare sūryasūnoḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9174: mohātpratipadaṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ kuhūṃ riktāṃ tithiṃ tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:9179: tailābhyaṅgaṃ na kurvīta kuryurvā navamīṃ vinā //
GSD36mvir_sau:9181: pañcamī daśamī caiva tṛtīyā ca trayodaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:9189: snāne vā yadi vāsnāne pavkatailaṃ na duṣyati //
GSD36mvir_sau:9195: ghṛtaṃ ca sārṣapaṃ tailaṃ yattailaṃ puṣpavāsitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9202: yadi nāma caturdaśyāṃ sadā māṃsaṃ vivarjayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:9204: caturthī cāṣṭamī caiva dvādaśī ca caturdaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:9206: saṅkrame cāpi sūryasya viṣuve cāpi vārṣike /
GSD36mvir_sau:9207: māṃsāttu virato martyo yāti svargaṃ dinatrayam //
GSD36mvir_sau:9211: yo naraḥ kārttike māsi māṃsaṃ tu perivarjayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:9213: kālanirṇayadīpikāyāṃ tu yadi nāma caturdaśyāmiti sthāne yadi nāma ca śarvaryāmiti pāṭhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9216: viṣṇuḥ--parvasu avaśyaṃ tilahomān kuryādalaṅkṛtastiṣṭhet evamācārasevī syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:9230: prājāpatyena brahmacaryakālena ca jāyayā sahaitāṃ rātriṃ sūryācandramasau vasata iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9241_1: ca tatpratipādakaśrutyādipramāṇasyāpi bheda uktastatra karmabhede hetumāhottarārdhena--nānādharmā ityādinā /
GSD36mvir_sau:9259_2: śrutyādīnāmapi bheda iva bhavati na punaḥ śrutyādīnāṃ karmaṇāṃ vā vāstavo bheda ityabhiprāyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9260: anayaiva ca diśā evañjātīyakāni vacanāni bodhyāni /
GSD36mvir_sau:9278: dvāpare yajñamevāhuḥ kalau dānaṃ dayā damaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9280: tapo dharmaḥ kṛtayuge jñānaṃ tretāyuge sthitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9281: dvāpare cādhvaraḥ proktastiṣye dānaṃ dayā damaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9287: dhyānaṃ paraṃ kṛtayuge tretāyāṃ yajanaṃ tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:9290: jñānaṃ paraṃ kṛtayuge tretāyāṃ ca tataḥ param /
GSD36mvir_sau:9292: dvāpare ca tathā yajñaḥ pratiṣṭhā tu kalau yuge //
GSD36mvir_sau:9295: kṛte tu mānavā dharmāstretāyāṃ gautamā matāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9297: tapaḥ paraṃ kṛtayuge ityādyuktaṃ tatra hetumāha--
GSD36mvir_sau:9300: dvāpare rudhire caiva kalau tvannādiṣu sthitāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9306: yuge yuge ca ye dharmāstatra tatra ca ye dvijāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9307: teṣāṃ nindā na kartavyā yugarūpā hi te dvijāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9309: kāmakrodhalobhādīn sarvān doṣānkālakṛtān jñātvā kasyāpi nindāṃ na kuryādityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9311: jito dharmo hyadharmeṇa satyaṃ caivānṛtena ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:9316: sthitirhi satyaṃ dharmasya tasmātsatyaṃ na lopayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:9317: ityādīni vidhiniṣedhāviṣayāṇi śrutismṛtiśāstrāṇyapramāṇīkṛtāni syuriti cet, na /
GSD36mvir_sau:9318_0: yugānurūpaṃ svasvasāmarthyamālocya mukyakalpenānukalpe na vā nityanaimittikāni karmāṇyanutiṣṭhatā
GSD36mvir_sau:9318_1: pratiṣiddhāni ca varjayatāṃ pramādakṛtapātakaprāyaścittāni cācaratāmatyantāśaktānāṃ vānindyatvam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9320: evaṃ satyapi vastuto nindyasyāpi svayaṃ doṣānnāviṣkuryāditi teṣāṃ nindā na kartavyetyasyābhiprāya iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9333: dvāpare bhagavān viṣṇuḥ kalau devo maheśvaraḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9337: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kalirityatra keśavaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9341: manuṣyāstu tadā śāntā nirvairāḥ suhṛdaḥ samāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9342: yajante tapasā devaṃ śamena ca damena ca //
GSD36mvir_sau:9347: taṃ tadā manujā devaṃ sarvadevamayaṃ harim /
GSD36mvir_sau:9368: puṣkaraṃ tu kṛte sevyaṃ tretāyāṃ naimiṣaṃ tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:9369: dvāpare tu kurukṣetraṃ kalau gaṅgāṃ samāśrayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:9371: kṛte tu sarvatīrthāni tretāyāṃ puṣkaraṃ param /
GSD36mvir_sau:9372: dvāpare tu kurukṣetraṃ kalau gaṅgā viśiṣyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:9377: dvāpare kulamekaṃ tu karttāraṃ tu kalau yuge //
GSD36mvir_sau:9385: sarvāvasthāṃ gato vāpi yukto vā sarvapātakaiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9386: yastvoṃnamaḥ śivāyeti mucyate tu kalau naraḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9390: sadā taṃ yajate yastu śraddhayā munipuṅgava/ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9397: ye taṃ viprāstu sevante yena kenāpi śaṅkaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:9406: na hyataḥ paramo lābho dehināṃ bhrāmyatāmiha /
GSD36mvir_sau:9407: yato vindeta paramāṃ śāntiṃ naśyati saṃsṛtiḥ //

GSD36mvir_sau:10021_1: caitryāṃ vā paurṇamāsyāṃ śunāsīrīyapuruṣo ya jetātha vaiśvadevāyopavaset vaiśvadeveneṣṭvā
GSD36mvir_sau:10021_2: paurṇamāsavaimṛdhābhyāṃ yajetātha cediṣṭayā paśunā somena vā yajeta kathaṃ tatra
GSD36mvir_sau:10021_3: kuryāditi pratikṛṣyaitasya pakṣasya śunāsīrīyapuruṣo yajetaiṣāmekena yajetātha vaiśvadevāyopavaset
GSD36mvir_sau:10022: atho etadbaudhāyanasya pakṣaṃ vedayante yāvjajīvikānyeva cāturmāsyāni syuriti /
GSD36mvir_sau:10024: atra yadā phālgunyāṃ pūrvasaṃvatsare upakramastadā phālgunyāṃ yadā caitryāmupakramastadā caitryāmiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:10025: atha cediṣṭhyeti yadi prayogasamāptyarthaṃ iṣṭyādi kriyate tadāyaṃ kramaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:10027: atho etadbaudhāyanasyetyādyuttyā ca yāvajjīvikaprayogo 'pi pākṣiko bodhyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:10030: yathāprayogamiti yāvatā kālena prayogasamāptirbhavati tāvati kāle santataṃ pūrvāhnādau kuryāditi /
GSD36mvir_sau:10033: na hi yathāprayogamityanena cāturmāsyakālavidhānaṃ kintu brahmacaryakālasya niyamaḥ prayogadinamitaiva vratacaryeti /
GSD36mvir_sau:10036: yāvajjīvaprayuktānyeva cāturmāsyāni syurantaramithunāni prathame tveva saṃvatsare vrataṃ caredityatrohasmāha śālākiḥ sāṃvatsarikānyeva cāturmāsyāni brahmacaryavantīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:10041: śālikimate tu sāṃvatsarikeṣve vāyaṃ niyamo na yāvajjīvikeṣu /
GSD36mvir_sau:10044: apare tu māstu yathāprayogamityataḥ santatakaraṇaṃ tathāpi“udagayana āpūryamāṇapakṣe samastāni“iti bhāradvājavacanātsamastānāṃ saṃlagnānāṃ prayoga iti /
